issue.title: unit-tests: build the unitprotos.h from here

repository.name: curl
repository.description: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax, supporting DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, MQTT, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMB, SMBS, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET, TFTP, WS and WSS. libcurl offers a myriad of powerful features

issue.body:
Make the bundle depend on the header in the lib dir and build it now if not present.

Reported-by: Todd Gamblin
Fixes #18088

rename.to: avoid building unitprotos.h at lib build-time

issue.title: curl: add 8.14.1 and 8.15.0
issue.body:
Update to the latest 8.14.1 and 8.15.0 releases.

`cmake` has some issues with `curl` 8.14.1 and `8.15` -- specifically, `cmake` 3.11:3.31.6` need a patch, and older versions won't work with these `curl` versions.

`curl` 8.15 removes support for `secure_transport` TLS on macOS, which was our default TLS version. So, we need to make it rely on `openssl`. This is not too disruptive, as everyone is either installing `openssl` or pointing at an external one anyway.

body: Oh, @vszakats! We should make our build-from-tarball CI test hide/uninstall perl so that we better detect if we introduce a perl dependency for this again.

> Oh, [@vszakats](https://github.com/vszakats)! We should make our build-from-tarball CI test hide/uninstall perl so that we better detect if we introduce a perl dependency for this again.

That'd be a good idea.

I almost never test without Perl, and just realized that cmake builds ignore
the pre-built hugehelp.c in both in-tree and out-of-tree builds. Also 
something to test in CI maybe. Once fixed, but my initial attempts weren't
successful.

issue.title: GHA/distcheck: add more tarball builds

issue.body:
- add AM out-of-tree no perl job.
- add AM in-tree no perl job.
- make CM out-of-tree job use no perl.
- add CM in-tree no perl job.
- run `curl -V` after builds.
- show the number of `--manual` lines.
- set `--enable-werror` in autotools jobs.

Ref: https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/18088#issuecomment-3135112176

---

- [x] FIXME: pre-built hugehelp is not picked up and included in the curl tool. (without Perl) → #18118 (cmake & autotools)
